title: Sticky lime and ginger chicken
time: Takes 10 minutes to make and 20 minutes to bake
description: Low in fat and packed with flavour, this cheap lime and ginger chicken recipe for two is deliciously sweet, sour and sticky.

method.Step 1: Preheat the oven to 230°C/fan210°C/gas 8. Drain and finely dice the ginger and mix with honey, soy sauce, lime zest and juice and garlic in a bowl.

method.Step 2: Add the chicken and mix together well. Spread out in a foil-lined or ceramic baking dish and bake for 20 minutes, turning over halfway, until cooked through.

method.Step 3: Serve the chicken with steamed basmati rice and tenderstem broccoli.
